reviews.review_msg: Awesome prof and really approachable. Midterm, final, weekly quizzes, and assignments are straightforward and really easy. study the online questions that she mentions and online quizzes for midterm and final. Easy A. We had the highest class average according to her. Definitely recommend.
not necessarily an easy course but you can definitely achieve an A if you put in the work

If you're not in the market to work for your grade don't bother attending. However, if you pay attention, take notes, and utalize office hours you should be fine. This is a good prep for upper level courses which WILL push you harder than this. Any negative rating probably comes from students refusing to put in the work needed.

No, this wasn't a law class. If you want a law class, take one with S. V-J. This was just a joke. She requires a lot of detail, but will often make mistakes in her own lecture. Ex: what is the meaning of wrong in an NCRMD Defence? She says: legally wrong or morally wrong. WRONG! The Oomen case says it's MORALLY wrong. Doesn't know what she's talkin
Nice prof, really knows his stuff and encourages discussion in lecture. Mid-term and Final were fair, and the two TA's were really chill and awesome!!

I find it funny that he has a hot chili pepper by his name. altho, i guess its his personality thats charming! he is VERY funny. every class is a riot, esp when he slips into swears. Very good prof, extremely fair exams, read the textbook that is the key! and dont be afraid to approach him to clarity things, hes very open and genuine.

very good prof.  exams r pretty much based on the txtbook...so don't have to really go to class...however, lectures (and his stories) r pretty interesting.  class isn't very hard, just read and understand the material and u'll be fine.
